com.intechcore.scomponents.scell.api.spreadsheet.service

Interface IStyleService


  • public interface IStyleService
    Represents cell style service interface

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      CompletableFuture<IRangeStyleAggregator> aggregate(IRangeAddress range)
      Aggregate styles to some structure

      Clear style of range of cells

    • Method Detail

      • aggregate

        CompletableFuture<IRangeStyleAggregator> aggregate(IRangeAddress range)
        Aggregate styles to some structure

        This method finds differences between all cell styles in specified range

        If fields are null it means that such parameter differs for any cells in range

        Parameters:
        range - range to aggregate
        Returns:
        aggregated styles structure
        See Also:
        IRangeStyleAggregator

      • edit

        CompletableFuture<Void> edit(IRangeAddress range,
                             UnaryOperator<IStyle> editor)
        Edit styles on range
        Parameters:
        range - range to edit current style
        editor - function which takes current style and produces the new style to apply
        Returns:
        CompletableFuture to be async
        See Also:
        IRangeAddress, IStyle

      • set

        CompletableFuture<Void> set(IRangeAddress range,
                            IStyle style)
        Set style to range of cells
        Parameters:
        range - range to set
        style - style to set
        Returns:
        CompletableFuture to be async
        See Also:
        IRangeAddress, IStyle

      • clear

        CompletableFuture<Void> clear(IRangeAddress range)
        Clear style of range of cells
        Parameters:
        range - range to clear
        Returns:
        CompletableFuture to be async
        See Also:
        IRangeAddress
